title: PSA to people who play unranked draft
body: Please don't QQ nonstop if you don't get a role or champ you want. People don't want to hear this degree of complaining in champ select. Team builder exist for a reason, if you come into a game unwilling to play any other role or champ than you should have never played draft to begin with but rather team builder. If you play draft you should have multiple different roles and champs you are capable of and willing to play.

replies.body: But I keep getting kicked from teams. How am I supposed to get to licus if no one lets met practice full ap draven jungle?
i keep getting kicked from teams trying to play challenger smite fizz top
I think anyone who hasn't seen that on LCS will assume that that's troll. I actually got accused of trolling for playing Fizz jungle.
Agreed. I go into draft practicing for ranked. I treat a draft game the way I do a ranked game. I will call my preferred roles, but fill the needs of the team as necessary.

I started draft so I can ban champions I am sick of dealing.

Waiting on a 6 minute queue while trying to go Yorick top for team builder is annoying.
yep i do draft every time a new champ comes out because i know if i dont ill be seeing two of them in ever game for the next month
everyone should play everywhere if you play draft at all ranked and unranked kinda incompetent not to.
Exactly, some people don't realize that's the point of draft.
I thought the point of draft was to build a team composition that would hopefully counter the enemies as much as possible via counterpicks and bans?
Yeah. Get people going "IDC for pick order if it's not ranked" all the damn time. I just wish Draft had votekick.

If someone says they want a role and is more demanding I usually just take it to make them mad.

If you're one of those people who say "i will be going mid" as soon as you get into the lobby, stop.

If you are one of those people who doesn't like teamwork, stop

Calling roles is important because then people understand you prefer that role. Your theory is like trying to communicate roles with chat box, summoner spells, and champions picked invisible
There's a difference between demanding to go mid and asking to go mid.
where does simply saying mid lie?

Not rude but not polite, same as saying nothing. Won't take the role with pick order to mess with them like I would to someone being rude, but won't fill around it if I was thinking of playing it but have another role of two I'm just as good at.
I guess you only love tyranny when it's your own tyranny.
Generally, the only people that say things like "I will be going mid" is whoever is first pick.

I wish there was somewhere that I could play seriously that isn't ranked. I won't rage but I don't want you going freaking Ryze support. I want a serious game with everyone being serious so I can improve without having the chances of getting demoted.
